name: ScanSource, Inc.
description: ScanSource, Inc. is a leading global provider of specialty technology products and solutions, catering mainly to the point-of-sale (POS), barcoding, and automatic identification markets. Founded in 1992 and headquartered in Greenville, South Carolina, the company has established itself as a key player in distributing products for various technology sectors. ScanSource operates through a wide network of resellers and vendors, delivering a comprehensive portfolio of products including POS terminals, barcode scanners, and supplies for various industries such as retail, healthcare, and logistics. The company focuses on enabling its partners to deliver innovative solutions that enhance operational efficiency and customer engagement. Through strategic partnerships with industry-leading manufacturers, ScanSource provides its partners with exceptional support, training, and resources. The company's commitment to customer service and technical expertise has earned it a strong reputation in the technology distribution space. With a robust logistics network and a dedication to fostering long-term relationships, ScanSource continues to expand its offerings and market reach, adapting to the evolving needs of its partners in an increasingly digital world.
